title: Lag spikes without ping (MS) increase since Patch 7.9
body:
Ever since patch 7.9 came out , I've been experiencing unusual lag spikes in my game, it seems that every 5-20 seconds I completely lose control of my champion for about 1 or 2 seconds. I've done a repair about 3 times now and I've even re-installed the game and still I've not found a fix. It's definitely not my internet as I can watch streams and Youtube videos without any issues. This seems to be just happening when I play league.

Is there any possible fix? It's really hard to play like this and I haven't even bothered to play in the past 3 days because of how bad it's been.   {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} {{item:3073}}

replies.body: Has anyone fixed this yet, somehow? It makes the game unplayable for me and I don't know what to do.

This input failure could still be caused by a connection problem like packet loss, even with stable ping.  To really know for sure, though, I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for a better analysis.  Let me know what you find and we'll go form there!

replies.poster: C Δ R N Δ G E
replies.body: I have the same problem as every1 here.I have stable ping (46 ms) but at some points im lagging for over 3 seconds.I've ran the log reader and it stated that everything was fine on my side...sooo i guess the problem is with riot servers...please make an effort to fix the problem

I also experience the same issue - the log reader tells me I had lost a "minimal" amount of packets last game (which was the first game I was playing after two weeks hiatus I took precisely because of this issue), but I had a plethora of occasions in the game where my commands simply did not register, even after inputing multiple times.
I do have the same problem, have not able to find a solution online yet.

I think that it's some issue with EUNE servers or client after last patch:
If you check ping you will notice that every now and then you get insane high ping for no reason. I recorded this with monitoring my network traffic and network didn't had any traffic:

Control-C
^C

Game is absolutely unplayable as of 7.9, no ping increase, but feels like an insane rate of dropped packets. Not on my end; I've tried multiple networks on differnt ISPs and other real time applications work flawlessly.

Edit: According to Log Reader I have 20% average packet loss. Ping is within tolerance.
Same problem!! The game has always ran fine before this patch.  Now I get weird lags where it just stalls for half a second.  My ping and internet connection are fine.  Riot please fix this.

Same problem here. Last game I watched it closer. It seemed to start normal, then at one point ping spiked to ~1500 and then stayed ~200 for the rest of the game. I closed my browser and all other apps, no effect. My connection is fine as well.

> [{quoted}](name=LikeWhiteOnRyze,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=w4zph6rp,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-13T11:27:35.814+0000)
>
> Same problem here. Last game I watched it closer. It seemed to start normal, then at one point ping spiked to ~1500 and then stayed ~200 for the rest of the game. I closed my browser and all other apps, no effect. My connection is fine as well.

Just to clarify: I also had the problem where the whole client freezes (for a very short time) and even input wasn't possible. Just not in that game (I think). Both effects started with the last patch (and I did use the new client before).
